choices: a member of a family that just moved hear
1.title: who are you

11.content:
you are Max a 15year old high school student you live alone with your mom Helen you moved hear 6 months after you dad was shot and killed it a bank robbery to start life new the insurance on your dad means nether of you have to work at all for the rest of your life .you unpack you get a big bed room and your mom comes in i see your still unpacking well i got you a copy of the town laws and she puts it on the night stand and says you mite want to go through it so tomorrow we can go through it together .so after you finish you lay down and start to read and you come across a strange section it reads in case of transformation who ever is left in the family that is human must
law 1 report the family member that transformed to the transformation center .
law 2 you must gather and wash all of the transformed members clothes and bring to the center ( including shoes and sports ware )
then go on with your daily life the center will provide you with all the stuff you need to take good care of the transformed family member .
11.title: just me and mom

111.content:
if you are alone or driving you.
1 as soon as you feel a tingling sensation you call the center and if you are driving pull over and call the center and tell them ware you are so they can come and get you to bring you home so make sure you got id on you at all times. if you are driving please leave a car door unlocked if you are home please leave the back door unlocked.
111.title: more law of transformaion

1111.content: you and your mom go through the town laws then spend the rest of the day finishing the unpacking then you go to bed and wake up to mom saying you got to go to school so you get ready and mom drops you off.
1111.title: The next Day

11111.content: after your mom drops you off you go to school Nathan Hail High school 9th grade you walk in and notice a strange assortment of ages from 10 to 50 at first you thought that the older ones were teachers but then you got to home room and the teacher was a 13 year old girl that said her name was Mr.Rich then she said to the class she transformed 3 years ago in to a mouse then a 10 year old girl so if any of you transform you can talk to me and I'll try to help you go on with the rest of your life then she says Kim i thought you graduated last year then a really pretty girl stands up and says I'm not this Kim my name is Tomas Labosky Tom for short I'm 15years old i transformed on the 3rd day of summer break now this is me all right then the teacher said then as your day goes on you meet Tim Jones a boy that didn't transform yet he walks up to you and says what a bunch of freaks he says to you i don't know you say after reading the town Laws i see now were they make seance and if you stay hear it can happen to you so i wouldn't poke fun at them if i were you names Max you say and I'm Tim so you and Tim be come best friends then you meet frank a real good looking boy has a tone body and muscle the girls like him over the next few months the 3 of you be come best of friends they even come over and spend a 2 weekends and you go spend time at there homes as well the 3 of you get to know each other very well you all play wow (world of war-craft ) together you all thought it would be cool to make female charters you get the very best gaming laptop you can buy and when you are invited to there birthday party you get them 2 gifts 1 you pay for a year of wow 2 a new gaming laptop like yours yep there your best friends .
11111.title: A STRANGE FIRST DAY AT SCHOOL

111111.content: you are at Tim's house with Tim and Frank playing wow they both can't thank you enough for there birthday gifts you say they already did when you saw the look of joy on there faces it made me feel so happy that i could make you so happy on that special day and you both shared it with me by inviting me to your party with your family that made me feel good so I'm so glad i could make you feel happy to then Tim says oho i feel a tingle in my foot and you and frank notice that Tim is shrinking so you call his mom and she comes up as Tim turns in to a mouse you pick him up so he don't strangle him self in his clothes his mom comes up and sees you holding him ever so gently she says i take it he's the mouse now you still in shock and holding him say yep then Frank says you should have seen him Max saved his life his clothes nearly strangled him to death i could not think straight but Max hear right a way found him and untangled him then you say hear you go now you better call the center so they can help and I'll help you gather all Tim's clothes then Frank says I'll help to thanks boys his mom says I'm really glad that Tim has friends like you two then she calls the center and you and frank gather all of Tim's clothes then the center comes and brings some stuff to help his mom take care of him as a mouse they bring up some bins to put clean clothes in so you and frank help his mom and then you call your mom to see if you and Frank can go to your house and hang your mom has no problem with that.
111111.title: 3 monthes later

1111111.content: after hanging with frank for the weakened you go to school and hang with frank that week you help each other with home work then you go home on Friday you get home and in the kitchen you find a broken plate by a pile of your moms clothes you see her black wool skirt and her red sweater and her pantyhose and stuck in her 4"high heeled boot a rabbit you get her out and you call the center then call frank he comes and helps you out you gather all your moms clothes you with Franks help the center comes and brings stuff to help you take care of your mom you and frank fill the bins with all your moms clothes then you lock your mom in her room with all the stuff for rabbits you check on her as offend as you can.
1111111.title: mom's tunn

11111111.content: as you and frank take care of your mom you even made rabbit stairs so mom can get to her bed and you go to school nothing special happens till Saturday when you see your mom's body knock at your door she was wearing her black wool skirt and a her winter coat and had Tim's computer bag so you let her in then she says hay guys i missed you so much i thought i would come over as soon as i be came human again and look at me i look great I'm just sorry it's your moms body i got .when Tim removes the winter coat you notice that she is also wearing your moms red wool sweater and her 4"high heeled boots that she was wearing the day she turned into a rabbit then you and Frank and Tim have a great time playing wow although you think it's strange hanging with Tim in your moms body but it's just something you'll have to get use to you guess after all she acts just like Tim.
11111111.title: anther week

111111111.content: well Frank says now that Tim is hear i need to go home so he calls his mom and she agrees to pick him up at 11pm so he can continue to play wow with you and Tim then Tim says you think i can stay a few days i think so you say so for 3hr the there of you play wow then Frank says Tim when you changed how did it (he was a mouse before he could finish the question )so you once again untangle a friend from his clothes you call his mom both you and Tim offer to help get his stuff ready for the center he's mom says i can really use it so you and Tim help Franks mom the center comes and brings stuff .you and Tim fill the bins and then you go home and Tim comes to you check on mom she is asleep in her bed Tim got some extra clothes for the week and you play wow with Tim till you both fall asleep .
111111111.title: franks turn

1111111111.content: the week goes by you and Tim do everything together on Wednesday the center comes and drops off Franks clothes then it hits you your mom will have Franks body and that will take some getting use to and Tim in hers who will Frank look like then Friday comes and you and Tim gets home and see Frank cleaning the house he says hi I'm glad to see you you say mom then Frank says it me and i got to emit Frank kept his body in great shape so now that I'm back i thank you Tim for keeping Max company and when Frank gets back I'll have you both over for 2 weeks in the summer for fun .were getting a swimming pool in the spring and Tim if you keep that body trim you'll look good in my ex-swimwear .
1111111111.title: moms return

11111111111.content: well for one thing this week is hell for Helen who has to get new id and all kinds of paper work on Monday you go to school and find out that a girl named Merry changed on Saturday then you remember her 320lb she stank all the time never showers then you now that Frank will have her body oh no you think ware Tim and Helen got what they consider an up grade Frank is getting a real looser body you know that Frank eats right jogs every morning and works out at the gym 3 times a week but now Frank is going to be a lot heaver than he's use to so you say Tim when you changed to a mouse were you able to under stand when you were talked to Tim says yes so lets go worn Frank so after school you and Tim goes to Franks house his mom says well he is still a mouse we need to talk to him so she lets the 2 of you in so you can talk to him . as soon as you find him you look at him and say i got some bad news for you we know who you will become then you say don't worry were still your best friends even though you will look like fat Merry were sorry but we found out that she transformed on Saturday we were hoping for Cindy or Candy but not Merry well we will be back on Saturday by then we hope your human again.so the 2 of you leave and go home you walk in your home and see Helen with a new laptop he says i thought i might join you and your friends for wow you think that's great and the rest of the week goes uneventful then on Saturday you go to Franks as promised and Helen comes with you he drives you and you pick up Tim as well then Franks mom lets you in you hear the shower going then 15min later after all of your computer hooked up you see hers all set then you see her mom go on the desk top then you all spend the day playing wow and Helen makes a deal with Frank if she looses all that extra weight he will pay for the surgery to have all that extra skin removed.
11111111111.title: who changed next

111111111111.content: OK by exercise and eating rite frank lost 10lb in 1 week just by eating what he use to eat never over eating the gym 3 times a week and a walk every morning it use to be a jog but the over wight new body took care of that but she looks foreword to when she get it in shape so she can jog again and she's clean and smells nice Frank says when she first became human again she was in the shower for 3hrs trying to get Merry's stench off then Frank says i intend to look good in a 2 piece swimsuit by summer .but nothing new happens til Friday you and your 2 buds go to your home Helen has Frank stand on a scale and sees that she lost 10lb you start feeling sick then the world gets a lot bigger you feel like your being strangled by your close you hear Tim yell oh my god Max then you feel her hands wrap around you and the next thing you know is your mom and friends are gathering your close you look in the mirror and see you are a very small withe mouse.
111111111111.title: 1 more week

1111111111111.content: well you are in your room for 2 weeks the first week goes by uneventful but on Monday your 2 friends come to inform you that the prettiest girl in school transformed over the weekend so you will be candy swan or at least you'll have her body on Friday then they leave then on Wednesday the center shows up with your new wardrobe Helen comes in and starts putting things away you see a lot of dresses,skirts,mine skirts ,pants suits,skirt suits,skinny jeans and sweats ,shorts and tube tops and all kinds of blouses shirts and t-shirts and the shoes you have so many different kinds and styles you can't wait to be human again.then on Friday at 2:00pm it all happens you start to tingle then grow to 5'6" then the change happens before you know it you are a very pretty Yong lady you got long golden blond hair blue eyes and the best figure you ever seen and its all yours .
1111111111111.title: mouse week

11111111111111.content: 1hr after you got Candy s body you get a shower and you grab a jean mine skirt and a lite blue sweater and a pair of pantyhose and you put them on then you pull out a pair of black 4"high heeled boots that goes to your nee then you wonder if that's what Candy was wearing when she changed to a rabbit then Helen knocks and says can i see you you say come in so Helen says look at you all prettied up Frank and Tim are hear to play wow with us so come down so you go down stairs and see Frank and Tim and Franks mom Kelly comes and joins the fun you all play wow all weekend .
11111111111111.title: the first day as a girl

info.brief_description: you move to a new town and some thing strange is going on
info.description:
you move to a new town ware for two weeks all boys change to mice and girls change in to bunnies then instead of getting your body back you get the body of whoever changed after you .for example lets say you made a good male friend named Joe then 1month later you got to know him very well then one day you go to school and he's not there you and him made plans for after school and he's dependable then you teacher says he transformed over the weakened then at the end of the week you go home and find your mom's clothing in the living room and a rabbit in your house then you remember reading the strange law of transformation reading if any one in your family is transformed the remaining family is to report it to the transformation center and gather up and wash all of the transformed person's clothes and bring them to the center so you do then they tell you that they will call you when it's time to come back to pick up your mom's new clothes .then a week later your mom's body approaches you acting like your friend Joe.now you get it so have fun .
rules1 the transformed is ether a mouse male or rabbit female
2 it last for 2 weeks
3 it's always Mose one week and rabbit the next
4 sex is OK but no gay or lesbian stuff (it must at least look boy girl)
5 the most important rule have fun
please feel free to add
info.pretty_title: town of tranfermation and body swap
